name: Paintvale but i made it bad lol (HTML 5 edition)
name_original: Paintvale but i made it bad lol (HTML 5 edition)
description:
Instructions is on here

so how to play huh?, so first of all arrow keys to move, up arrow key to jump, touch the gray part to break the gray part, and that's it!

Credits are on here

i didn't own paintvale, pinpan or pinpan owned paintvale, that fangame of paintvale by BBSPLASH, it's work in progress
